attributes.description: 2019 Lexus LC500 30 000km Full service history with lexus Balance of plan remaining 2025 or 105 000km The LC500 is as close as us mere mortals are going to get to the iconic LFA. There's so much LFA DNA in the LC that it truly is an occasion, each and every time you push the start button. But what makes it so special? To start with, the LC500 is powered by a 351kW 5.0-liter V8. While many of its competitors are going the turbocharged route, the LC500 is still naturally aspirated. It churns out a healthy 540Nm of torque and sends that power to the rear wheels through an automatic 10-speed gearbox with steering mounted paddle shifters.It has a immaculate Alcantara and black interior. * Adaptive headlights * Adaptive cruise control * Touch screen infotainment System * Paddle shift * heads up displays * lane assist * Android auto and Apple car play * Bluetooth * Multifunctional steering wheel * Red and Black leather trim Feel free to view the vehicle at our New showroom and meet our world class team at Waterfall Ridge Shopping Centre , Ridge Rd, 1683 waterfall Midrand "???? ?????? ???????????? ???????? ?? ??????????" * Finance available through all major banks * Trade-ins are welcome #onenineauto #dealwithpeopleyouknow #friendswhobecomefamily #luxurycars #lc500 #besposke #carsforsale#luxurycars #machines #sales
